comprehensive_overview: BBMap is a fast and accurate short-read aligner for mapping DNA sequences to a reference genome. It also includes various bioinformatics tools for sequence alignment, mapping, assembly, and analysis.
core_features: 1. High-speed short read aligner. 2. Capable of mapping DNA sequences to a reference genome. 3. Includes various bioinformatics tools for sequence analysis and assembly. 4. Supports various file formats.
